subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rasheed Wallace forced overtime with a 60-foot shot at the buzzer last night, then added another important 3-pointer in the extra period to help the Detroit Pistons defeat the Denver Nuggets, 113-109.
snippet: Rasheed Wallace forced overtime with a 60-foot shot at the buzzer last night, then added another important 3-pointer in the extra period to help the Detroit Pistons defeat the Denver Nuggets, 113-109.
